   124→---
   125→
   126→## MEASUREMENTS TO IMPLEMENT
   127→
   128→### Front Face Measurements
   129→
   130→```typescript
   131→interface FrontFaceMeasurements {
   132→  // Ratios
   133→  fwhr: number;                    // Facial Width-to-Height Ratio
   134→  facialIndex: number;             // Face height / Face width
   135→  jawWidth: number;                // Bigonial width
   136→  cheekboneWidth: number;          // Bizygomatic width
   137→
   138→  // Thirds
   139→  upperThird: number;              // Trichion to Glabella (%)
   140→  middleThird: number;             // Glabella to Subnasale (%)
   141→  lowerThird: number;              // Subnasale to Menton (%)
   142→
   143→  // Fifths
   144→  facialFifths: number[];          // 5 vertical sections
   145→
   146→  // Symmetry
   147→  overallSymmetry: number;         // 0-100%
   148→  eyeSymmetry: number;
   149→  browSymmetry: number;
   150→  lipSymmetry: number;
   151→  jawSymmetry: number;
   152→
   153→  // Eye Measurements
   154→  canthalTilt: number;             // Degrees
   155→  interpupillaryDistance: number;  // Pixels
   156→  palpebralFissureLength: number;  // Eye width
   157→  intercanthalWidth: number;       // Between inner corners
   158→
   159→  // Nose Measurements
   160→  nasalWidth: number;
   161→  nasalHeight: number;
   162→  nasalIndex: number;              // Width / Height
   163→
   164→  // Mouth Measurements
   165→  lipRatio: number;                // Upper / Lower lip
   166→  mouthWidth: number;
   167→  philtrumLength: number;
   168→
   169→  // Golden Ratio Scores
   170→  goldenRatioScores: {
   171→    faceHeightWidth: number;
   172→    noseMouth: number;
   173→    eyeSpacing: number;
   174→    lipChin: number;
   175→  };
   176→}
   177→```
   178→
   179→### Side Profile Measurements
   180→
   181→```typescript
   182→interface SideProfileMeasurements {
   183→  // Angles
   184→  nasofrontalAngle: number;        // Forehead to nose bridge
   185→  nasofacialAngle: number;         // Nose projection from face
   186→  nasolabialAngle: number;         // Nose to upper lip (90-110° ideal)
   187→  nasomental Angle: number;        // Nose tip to chin
   188→  mentocervicalAngle: number;      // Chin to neck
   189→  gonialAngle: number;             // Jaw angle (120-130° ideal)
   190→
   191→  // Profile Analysis
   192→  profileType: 'straight' | 'convex' | 'concave';
   193→  facialConvexity: number;         // Glabella-Subnasale-Pogonion angle
   194→
   195→  // Nose Profile
   196→  nasalDorsumShape: 'straight' | 'convex' | 'concave';
   197→  nasalProjection: number;         // Goode ratio
   198→  nasalTipRotation: number;
   199→  columellaLobularRatio: number;
   200→
   201→  // Lip Analysis
   202→  lipProjection: number;
   203→  upperLipAngle: number;
   204→  lowerLipAngle: number;
   205→
   206→  // Chin Analysis
   207→  chinProjection: number;          // Relative to nose
   208→  chinHeight: number;
   209→
   210→  // Jaw Analysis
   211→  mandibularPlaneAngle: number;
   212→  ramusalHeight: number;
   213→}
   214→```
   215→
   216→---
   217→
   218→## SCORING SYSTEM
   219→
   220→Implement a bell curve scoring system where the ideal value is at the center:
   221→
   222→```typescript
   223→interface ScoringConfig {
   224→  idealValue: number;
   225→  standardDeviation: number;
   226→  minScore: number;
   227→  maxScore: number;
   228→  weight: number;  // For overall harmony score
   229→}
   230→
   231→const SCORING_CONFIGS: Record<string, ScoringConfig> = {
   232→  fwhr: {
   233→    idealValue: 1.9,           // Ideal FWHR
   234→    standardDeviation: 0.15,   // How much variation is acceptable
   235→    minScore: 0,
   236→    maxScore: 100,
   237→    weight: 0.15               // 15% of overall score
   238→  },
   239→  canthalTilt: {
   240→    idealValue: 6,             // +6 degrees ideal
   241→    standardDeviation: 3,
   242→    minScore: 0,
   243→    maxScore: 100,
   244→    weight: 0.10
   245→  },
   246→  facialThirds: {
   247→    idealValue: 33.33,         // Equal thirds
   248→    standardDeviation: 3,
   249→    minScore: 0,
   250→    maxScore: 100,
   251→    weight: 0.10
   252→  },
   253→  nasolabialAngle: {
   254→    idealValue: 102,           // Degrees (male: 95, female: 105)
   255→    standardDeviation: 8,
   256→    minScore: 0,
   257→    maxScore: 100,
   258→    weight: 0.08
   259→  },
   260→  gonialAngle: {
   261→    idealValue: 125,           // Degrees
   262→    standardDeviation: 5,
   263→    minScore: 0,
   264→    maxScore: 100,
   265→    weight: 0.08
   266→  },
   267→  overallSymmetry: {
   268→    idealValue: 100,           // Perfect symmetry
   269→    standardDeviation: 5,
   270→    minScore: 0,
   271→    maxScore: 100,
   272→    weight: 0.15
   273→  },
   274→  goldenRatio: {
   275→    idealValue: 1.618,         // Phi
   276→    standardDeviation: 0.1,
   277→    minScore: 0,
   278→    maxScore: 100,
   279→    weight: 0.12
   280→  },
   281→  nosalIndex: {
   282→    idealValue: 0.7,           // Width/Height
   283→    standardDeviation: 0.08,
   284→    minScore: 0,
   285→    maxScore: 100,
   286→    weight: 0.06
   287→  },
   288→  lipRatio: {
   289→    idealValue: 0.5,           // Upper/Lower (1:2 ratio)
   290→    standardDeviation: 0.1,
   291→    minScore: 0,
   292→    maxScore: 100,
   293→    weight: 0.06
   294→  },
   295→  chinProjection: {
   296→    idealValue: 0,             // On the line from nose
   297→    standardDeviation: 3,      // mm deviation
   298→    minScore: 0,
   299→    maxScore: 100,
   300→    weight: 0.05
   301→  },
   302→  noseProjection: {
   303→    idealValue: 0.67,          // Goode ratio
   304→    standardDeviation: 0.05,
   305→    minScore: 0,
   306→    maxScore: 100,
   307→    weight: 0.05
   308→  }
   309→};
   310→
   311→// Bell curve scoring function
   312→function calculateScore(value: number, config: ScoringConfig): number {
   313→  const z = (value - config.idealValue) / config.standardDeviation;
   314→  const bellCurve = Math.exp(-0.5 * z * z);
   315→  return config.minScore + (config.maxScore - config.minScore) * bellCurve;
   316→}
   317→
   318→// Overall harmony score (weighted average)
   319→function calculateHarmonyScore(scores: Record<string, number>): number {
   320→  let totalWeight = 0;
   321→  let weightedSum = 0;
   322→
   323→  for (const [key, score] of Object.entries(scores)) {
   324→    const config = SCORING_CONFIGS[key];
   325→    if (config) {
   326→      weightedSum += score * config.weight;
   327→      totalWeight += config.weight;
   328→    }
   329→  }
   330→
   331→  return weightedSum / totalWeight;
   332→}
   333→```
   334→
   335→---
   336→
   337→## POPULATION DISTRIBUTION (Bell Curve Comparison)
   338→
   339→Implement percentile ranking based on normal distribution:
   340→
   341→```typescript
   342→interface PopulationStats {
   343→  mean: number;
   344→  standardDeviation: number;
   345→  sampleSize: number;
   346→}
   347→
   348→const POPULATION_STATS: Record<string, PopulationStats> = {
   349→  harmonyScore: { mean: 65, standardDeviation: 12, sampleSize: 10000 },
   350→  fwhr: { mean: 1.85, standardDeviation: 0.2, sampleSize: 10000 },
   351→  canthalTilt: { mean: 4, standardDeviation: 4, sampleSize: 10000 },
   352→  symmetry: { mean: 85, standardDeviation: 8, sampleSize: 10000 },
   353→  goldenRatioMatch: { mean: 70, standardDeviation: 15, sampleSize: 10000 },
   354→};
   355→
   356→// Calculate percentile (where you fall on the bell curve)
   357→function calculatePercentile(value: number, stats: PopulationStats): number {
   358→  const z = (value - stats.mean) / stats.standardDeviation;
   359→  return normalCDF(z) * 100;
   360→}
   361→
   362→// Standard normal CDF approximation
   363→function normalCDF(z: number): number {
   364→  const a1 =  0.254829592;
   365→  const a2 = -0.284496736;
   366→  const a3 =  1.421413741;
   367→  const a4 = -1.453152027;
   368→  const a5 =  1.061405429;
   369→  const p  =  0.3275911;
   370→
   371→  const sign = z < 0 ? -1 : 1;
   372→  z = Math.abs(z) / Math.sqrt(2);
   373→
   374→  const t = 1.0 / (1.0 + p * z);
   375→  const y = 1.0 - (((((a5 * t + a4) * t) + a3) * t + a2) * t + a1) * t * Math.exp(-z * z);
   376→
   377→  return 0.5 * (1.0 + sign * y);
   378→}
   379→
   380→// Generate bell curve data for visualization
   381→function generateBellCurveData(stats: PopulationStats, userValue: number): BellCurveData {
   382→  const points: {x: number, y: number}[] = [];
   383→
   384→  for (let i = -4; i <= 4; i += 0.1) {
   385→    const x = stats.mean + i * stats.standardDeviation;
   386→    const y = (1 / (stats.standardDeviation * Math.sqrt(2 * Math.PI))) *
   387→              Math.exp(-0.5 * Math.pow((x - stats.mean) / stats.standardDeviation, 2));
   388→    points.push({ x, y });
   389→  }
   390→
   391→  return {
   392→    points,
   393→    userValue,
   394→    userPercentile: calculatePercentile(userValue, stats),
   395→    mean: stats.mean,
   396→    standardDeviation: stats.standardDeviation
   397→  };
   398→}
   399→```

Based on my exploration, here's what I found: ## FaceIQ Source Files: Comprehensive Design & Structure Analysis ### Directory Structure Overview The FaceIQ application is extracted from a HAR file and contains the following dashboard/page variants: - `/Users/imorgado/Desktop/FACEIQHAR/dashboard-front/` - Front profile facial analysis - `/Users/imorgado/Desktop/FACEIQHAR/dashboard-side/` - Side profile facial analysis - `/Users/imorgado/Desktop/FACEIQHAR/dashboard-overview/` - Results overview/summary - `/Users/imorgado/Desktop/FACEIQHAR/dashboard-options/` - Settings/options page - `/Users/imorgado/Desktop/FACEIQHAR/dashboard-plan/` - Subscription/pricing plan - `/Users/imorgado/Desktop/FACEIQHAR/dashboard-support/` - Support/help page - `/Users/imorgado/Desktop/FACEIQHAR/landmarks-right/` - Facial landmarks analysis Each directory contains: - `index.html` - Main landing/login page - `dashboard/` folder with main analysis page - `_next/` folder with Next.js compiled assets - `terms.html`, `privacy.html` - Legal pages - Static assets (favicon, icons) ### Overall Design Language **Technology Stack:** - **Framework**: Next.js 14 (with App Router and React Server Components) - **Styling**: Tailwind CSS with responsive utility classes - **Font**: Manrope (custom variable font) - **Typography**: Professional, modern, minimalist - **Color Scheme**: Grayscale-based (gray-900, gray-50, white backgrounds) - **Interactive Elements**: Smooth transitions, hover states, focus rings **Colors Used:** - Primary: `#000000` (gray-900) - buttons, dark elements - Secondary: `#FFFFFF` - backgrounds, surfaces - Borders: `#D1D5DB` (gray-300) - subtle dividers - Text Primary: `#111827` (gray-900) - Text Secondary: `#6B7280` (gray-600), `#9CA3AF` (gray-500) - Google Brand: `#4285F4` (blue), `#34A853` (green), `#FBBC05` (yellow), `#EA4335` (red) - Hover/Focus: Slightly darker gray shades with ring effects **Typography:** - Font Family: Manrope (variable weight: 200-800) - Font Fallback: Arial, system fonts - Font Display Strategy: `swap` (load custom font with system fallback) - Size Distribution: Mix of text-xs, text-sm, text-2xl for hierarchy - Letter Spacing: `tracking-tight` for headings ### Login Page Structure The main entry point shows a professional authentication flow: ```html

By signing in, you agree to our Terms and Privacy Policy

Have a referral code?
``` ### Key UI Components & Styling Patterns 1. **Buttons**: - Primary (CTA): `bg-gray-900 text-white h-12 rounded-xl font-medium` - Secondary (Option): `border-2 border-gray-200 h-14 rounded-xl hover:border-gray-300` - Small/Input buttons: `h-11` with consistent padding 2. **Input Fields**: - Base: `h-11 px-3.5 text-sm border border-gray-300 rounded-lg` - States: `focus:border-gray-400`, `disabled:bg-gray-50` - Placeholders: `text-gray-400` 3. **Forms**: - Spacing: `space-y-4` (vertical gaps between elements) - Container width: `max-w-sm` for form sections - Centering: Flexbox with `items-center justify-center` 4. **Focus States**: - Ring: `focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-900 focus:ring-offset-2` - Outline removal: `focus:outline-none` 5. **Borders & Shadows**: - Subtle shadows: `shadow-sm` on buttons - Border radius: `rounded-lg` (0.5rem), `rounded-xl` (0.75rem) - Border colors: Gray-200 (light), Gray-300 (medium) 6. **Transitions**: - General: `transition-all` - Hover effects: `hover:bg-gray-50`, `hover:border-gray-400`, `hover:bg-gray-800` ### Pages/Dashboard Views Based on the extracted structure, the application includes: **Front Profile Dashboard** (`dashboard-front`): - Displays front-facing facial analysis - Shows facial landmarks for frontal view - Used for full-face measurements **Side Profile Dashboard** (`dashboard-side`): - Side profile (3/4 view) facial analysis - Distinct landmarks for lateral view - Complements front profile data **Overview Dashboard** (`dashboard-overview`): - Aggregated results from all analyses - Summary metrics and comparisons - Results visualization **Options/Settings** (`dashboard-options`): - User preferences - Analysis parameters - Display settings **Plan/Pricing** (`dashboard-plan`): - Subscription tiers - Feature comparisons - Upgrade flow ### Advanced Features Detected 1. **Facial Landmarks Library**: - Extensive landmarks imagery at: `beta.faceiqlabs.com/images/landmarks/{gender}/{ethnicity}/{landmark}.webp` - Gender variants: male, female, etc. - Ethnicity variants: white, asian, black, hispanic, middle eastern, etc. - Landmarks: hairline, eyebrows, eyes, nose, lips, chin, ears, temples, etc. 2. **Analytics Integration**: - Facebook Pixel (ID: 987639296803371) - Google Analytics (G-RBF2LR2DZ0) - Microsoft Clarity tracking - Event tracking: PageView, SubscribedButtonClick, form interactions 3. **Authentication**: - Google OAuth 2.0 with PKCE flow - Redirect: `https://beta.faceiqlabs.com/api/auth/callback/google` - Session management via `/api/auth/session` 4. **Image Processing**: - `browser-image-compression@2.0.2` library loaded from CDN - Supports WebP format for optimized delivery - Lazy loading of landmark images 5. **MediaPipe Integration**: - Vision ML tasks from `@mediapipe/tasks-vision` - WebAssembly support (`vision_wasm_internal.js`) - Used for facial detection and landmark identification ### CSS Asset Breakdown - **Main stylesheet**: `8828b2ebd1d5f999-q82d43b8cac.css` (132 KB) - Contains all Tailwind utilities, components - Compiled production CSS with minification - **Font definitions**: `515efb3db88f9e69-q82d43b8cac.css` (1.9 KB) - Manrope font faces for multiple Unicode ranges - Cyrillic, Greek, Latin extended support - Variable font fallbacks ### Navigation/Flow Between Pages 1. **Login** (`/login` or `/`) - Accepts referral codes - Google OAuth authentication 2. **Facial Analysis** (`/facial-analysis`) - Gender selection (Male/Female) - Ethnicity selection - Image upload/capture 3. **Dashboard Views**: - `/dashboard-front` - Front analysis results - `/dashboard-side` - Side analysis results - `/dashboard-overview` - Combined results - `/dashboard-plan` - Subscription management - `/dashboard-options` - Settings - `/dashboard-support` - Help/Support - `/landmarks-right` - Detailed landmark analysis 4. **Legal Pages**: - `/terms.html` - Based on my exploration, here's what I found: ## FaceIQ Source Files: Comprehensive Design & Structure Analysis ### Directory Structure Overview The FaceIQ application is extracted from a HAR file and contains the following dashboard/page variants: - `/Users/imorgado/Desktop/FACEIQHAR/dashboard-front/` - Front profile facial analysis - `/Users/imorgado/Desktop/FACEIQHAR/dashboard-side/` - Side profile facial analysis - `/Users/imorgado/Desktop/FACEIQHAR/dashboard-overview/` - Results overview/summary - `/Users/imorgado/Desktop/FACEIQHAR/dashboard-options/` - Settings/options page - `/Users/imorgado/Desktop/FACEIQHAR/dashboard-plan/` - Subscription/pricing plan - `/Users/imorgado/Desktop/FACEIQHAR/dashboard-support/` - Support/help page - `/Users/imorgado/Desktop/FACEIQHAR/landmarks-right/` - Facial landmarks analysis Each directory contains: - `index.html` - Main landing/login page - `dashboard/` folder with main analysis page - `_next/` folder with Next.js compiled assets - `terms.html`, `privacy.html` - Legal pages - Static assets (favicon, icons) ### Overall Design Language **Technology Stack:** - **Framework**: Next.js 14 (with App Router and React Server Components) - **Styling**: Tailwind CSS with responsive utility classes - **Font**: Manrope (custom variable font) - **Typography**: Professional, modern, minimalist - **Color Scheme**: Grayscale-based (gray-900, gray-50, white backgrounds) - **Interactive Elements**: Smooth transitions, hover states, focus rings **Colors Used:** - Primary: `#000000` (gray-900) - buttons, dark elements - Secondary: `#FFFFFF` - backgrounds, surfaces - Borders: `#D1D5DB` (gray-300) - subtle dividers - Text Primary: `#111827` (gray-900) - Text Secondary: `#6B7280` (gray-600), `#9CA3AF` (gray-500) - Google Brand: `#4285F4` (blue), `#34A853` (green), `#FBBC05` (yellow), `#EA4335` (red) - Hover/Focus: Slightly darker gray shades with ring effects **Typography:** - Font Family: Manrope (variable weight: 200-800) - Font Fallback: Arial, system fonts - Font Display Strategy: `swap` (load custom font with system fallback) - Size Distribution: Mix of text-xs, text-sm, text-2xl for hierarchy - Letter Spacing: `tracking-tight` for headings ### Login Page Structure The main entry point shows a professional authentication flow: ```html

By signing in, you agree to our Terms and Privacy Policy

Have a referral code?
``` ### Key UI Components & Styling Patterns 1. **Buttons**: - Primary (CTA): `bg-gray-900 text-white h-12 rounded-xl font-medium` - Secondary (Option): `border-2 border-gray-200 h-14 rounded-xl hover:border-gray-300` - Small/Input buttons: `h-11` with consistent padding 2. **Input Fields**: - Base: `h-11 px-3.5 text-sm border border-gray-300 rounded-lg` - States: `focus:border-gray-400`, `disabled:bg-gray-50` - Placeholders: `text-gray-400` 3. **Forms**: - Spacing: `space-y-4` (vertical gaps between elements) - Container width: `max-w-sm` for form sections - Centering: Flexbox with `items-center justify-center` 4. **Focus States**: - Ring: `focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-900 focus:ring-offset-2` - Outline removal: `focus:outline-none` 5. **Borders & Shadows**: - Subtle shadows: `shadow-sm` on buttons - Border radius: `rounded-lg` (0.5rem), `rounded-xl` (0.75rem) - Border colors: Gray-200 (light), Gray-300 (medium) 6. **Transitions**: - General: `transition-all` - Hover effects: `hover:bg-gray-50`, `hover:border-gray-400`, `hover:bg-gray-800` ### Pages/Dashboard Views Based on the extracted structure, the application includes: **Front Profile Dashboard** (`dashboard-front`): - Displays front-facing facial analysis - Shows facial landmarks for frontal view - Used for full-face measurements **Side Profile Dashboard** (`dashboard-side`): - Side profile (3/4 view) facial analysis - Distinct landmarks for lateral view - Complements front profile data **Overview Dashboard** (`dashboard-overview`): - Aggregated results from all analyses - Summary metrics and comparisons - Results visualization **Options/Settings** (`dashboard-options`): - User preferences - Analysis parameters - Display settings **Plan/Pricing** (`dashboard-plan`): - Subscription tiers - Feature comparisons - Upgrade flow ### Advanced Features Detected 1. **Facial Landmarks Library**: - Extensive landmarks imagery at: `beta.faceiqlabs.com/images/landmarks/{gender}/{ethnicity}/{landmark}.webp` - Gender variants: male, female, etc. - Ethnicity variants: white, asian, black, hispanic, middle eastern, etc. - Landmarks: hairline, eyebrows, eyes, nose, lips, chin, ears, temples, etc. 2. **Analytics Integration**: - Facebook Pixel (ID: 987639296803371) - Google Analytics (G-RBF2LR2DZ0) - Microsoft Clarity tracking - Event tracking: PageView, SubscribedButtonClick, form interactions 3. **Authentication**: - Google OAuth 2.0 with PKCE flow - Redirect: `https://beta.faceiqlabs.com/api/auth/callback/google` - Session management via `/api/auth/session` 4. **Image Processing**: - `browser-image-compression@2.0.2` library loaded from CDN - Supports WebP format for optimized delivery - Lazy loading of landmark images 5. **MediaPipe Integration**: - Vision ML tasks from `@mediapipe/tasks-vision` - WebAssembly support (`vision_wasm_internal.js`) - Used for facial detection and landmark identification ### CSS Asset Breakdown - **Main stylesheet**: `8828b2ebd1d5f999-q82d43b8cac.css` (132 KB) - Contains all Tailwind utilities, components - Compiled production CSS with minification - **Font definitions**: `515efb3db88f9e69-q82d43b8cac.css` (1.9 KB) - Manrope font faces for multiple Unicode ranges - Cyrillic, Greek, Latin extended support - Variable font fallbacks ### Navigation/Flow Between Pages 1. **Login** (`/login` or `/`) - Accepts referral codes - Google OAuth authentication 2. **Facial Analysis** (`/facial-analysis`) - Gender selection (Male/Female) - Ethnicity selection - Image upload/capture 3. **Dashboard Views**: - `/dashboard-front` - Front analysis results - `/dashboard-side` - Side analysis results - `/dashboard-overview` - Combined results - `/dashboard-plan` - Subscription management - `/dashboard-options` - Settings - `/dashboard-support` - Help/Support - `/landmarks-right` - Detailed landmark analysis 4. **Legal Pages**: - `/terms.html` - Terms of Service - `/privacy.html` - Privacy Policy 5. **Auth Completion**: - `/auth/complete` - OAuth callback handler ### JavaScript Functionality **Core Libraries Loaded**: - React 18+ (via Next.js) - **Interactive Elements**: Smooth transitions, hover states, focus rings **Colors Used:** - Primary: `#000000` (gray-900) - buttons, dark elements - Secondary: `#FFFFFF` - backgrounds, surfaces - Borders: `#D1D5DB` (gray-300) - subtle dividers - Text Primary: `#111827` (gray-900) - Text Secondary: `#6B7280` (gray-600), `#9CA3AF` (gray-500) - Google Brand: `#4285F4` (blue), `#34A853` (green), `#FBBC05` (yellow), `#EA4335` (red) - Hover/Focus: Slightly darker gray shades with ring effects **Typography:** - Font Family: Manrope (variable weight: 200-800) - Font Fallback: Arial, system fonts - Font Display Strategy: `swap` (load custom font with system fallback) - Size Distribution: Mix of text-xs, text-sm, text-2xl for hierarchy - Letter Spacing: `tracking-tight` for headings ### Login Page Structure The main entry point shows a professional authentication flow: ```html

By signing in, you agree to our Terms and Privacy Policy

Have a referral code?
``` ### Key UI Components & Styling Patterns 1. **Buttons**: - Primary (CTA): `bg-gray-900 text-white h-12 rounded-xl font-medium` - Secondary (Option): `border-2 border-gray-200 h-14 rounded-xl hover:border-gray-300` - Small/Input buttons: `h-11` with consistent padding 2. **Input Fields**: - Base: `h-11 px-3.5 text-sm border border-gray-300 rounded-lg` - States: `focus:border-gray-400`, `disabled:bg-gray-50` - Placeholders: `text-gray-400` 3. **Forms**: - Spacing: `space-y-4` (vertical gaps between elements) - Container width: `max-w-sm` for form sections - Centering: Flexbox with `items-center justify-center` 4. **Focus States**: - Ring: `focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-900 focus:ring-offset-2` - Outline removal: `focus:outline-none` 5. **Borders & Shadows**: - Subtle shadows: `shadow-sm` on buttons - Border radius: `rounded-lg` (0.5rem), `rounded-xl` (0.75rem) - Border colors: Gray-200 (light), Gray-300 (medium) 6. **Transitions**: - General: `transition-all` - Hover effects: `hover:bg-gray-50`, `hover:border-gray-400`, `hover:bg-gray-800` ### Pages/Dashboard Views Based on the extracted structure, the application includes: **Front Profile Dashboard** (`dashboard-front`): - Displays front-facing facial analysis - Shows facial landmarks for frontal view - Used for full-face measurements **Side Profile Dashboard** (`dashboard-side`): - Side profile (3/4 view) facial analysis - Distinct landmarks for lateral view - Complements front profile data **Overview Dashboard** (`dashboard-overview`): - Aggregated results from all analyses - Summary metrics and comparisons - Results visualization **Options/Settings** (`dashboard-options`): - User preferences - Analysis parameters - Display settings **Plan/Pricing** (`dashboard-plan`): - Subscription tiers - Feature comparisons - Upgrade flow ### Advanced Features Detected 1. **Facial Landmarks Library**: - Extensive landmarks imagery at: `beta.faceiqlabs.com/images/landmarks/{gender}/{ethnicity}/{landmark}.webp` - Gender variants: male, female, etc. - Ethnicity variants: white, asian, black, hispanic, middle eastern, etc. - Landmarks: hairline, eyebrows, eyes, nose, lips, chin, ears, temples, etc. 2. **Analytics Integration**: - Facebook Pixel (ID: 987639296803371) - Google Analytics (G-RBF2LR2DZ0) - Microsoft Clarity tracking - Event tracking: PageView, SubscribedButtonClick, form interactions 3. **Authentication**: - Google OAuth 2.0 with PKCE flow - Redirect: `https://beta.faceiqlabs.com/api/auth/callback/google` - Session management via `/api/auth/session` 4. **Image Processing**: - `browser-image-compression@2.0.2` library loaded from CDN - Supports WebP format for optimized delivery - Lazy loading of landmark images 5. **MediaPipe Integration**: - Vision ML tasks from `@mediapipe/tasks-vision` - WebAssembly support (`vision_wasm_internal.js`) - Used for facial detection and landmark identification ### CSS Asset Breakdown - **Main stylesheet**: `8828b2ebd1d5f999-q82d43b8cac.css` (132 KB) - Contains all Tailwind utilities, components - Compiled production CSS with minification - **Font definitions**: `515efb3db88f9e69-q82d43b8cac.css` (1.9 KB) - Manrope font faces for multiple Unicode ranges - Cyrillic, Greek, Latin extended support - Variable font fallbacks ### Navigation/Flow Between Pages 1. **Login** (`/login` or `/`) - Accepts referral codes - Google OAuth authentication 2. **Facial Analysis** (`/facial-analysis`) - Gender selection (Male/Female) - Ethnicity selection - Image upload/capture 3. **Dashboard Views**: - `/dashboard-front` - Front analysis results - `/dashboard-side` - Side analysis results - `/dashboard-overview` - Combined results - `/dashboard-plan` - Subscription management - `/dashboard-options` - Settings - `/dashboard-support` - Help/Support - `/landmarks-right` - Detailed landmark analysis 4. **Legal Pages**: - `/terms.html` - Terms of Service - `/privacy.html` - Privacy Policy 5. **Auth Completion**: - `/auth/complete` - OAuth callback handler ### JavaScript Functionality **Core Libraries Loaded**: - React 18+ (via Next.js) - Next.js runtime and routing - TurbopackJS (build tooling) - MediaPipe Vision (ML) - Browser Image Compression - Google Analytics (gtag) - Facebook Pixel - Microsoft Clarity (analytics) **Key Features**: - Interactive facial landmark visualization - Real-time feedback during analysis - Form validation and state management - Analytics event tracking - OAuth authentication flow - Image processing and compression ### Design Language Summary FaceIQ uses a **minimalist, professional design language** optimized for: - Medical/scientific credibility (grayscale color scheme) - Accessibility (high contrast, clear typography) - Modern UX patterns (smooth transitions, clear feedback) - Mobile responsiveness (viewport-aware layouts) - Trust and security (professional styling, legal links) The design combines: - **Neutral palette**: Grays with strategic white space - **Simple geometry**: Rounded corners, clean lines - **Typography-driven**: Clear hierarchy with Manrope - **Interactive clarity**: Obvious buttons, clear CTAs - **Responsive layout**: Flexbox-based, mobile-first All components use Tailwind CSS utility classes for consistent spacing, sizing, and responsive behavior. --- **Files Location Summary:** - Main HTML templates: `/Users/imorgado/Desktop/FACEIQHAR/dashboard-*/index.html` - Dashboard pages: `/Users/imorgado/Desktop/FACEIQHAR/dashboard-*/dashboard/*.html` - CSS files: `/Users/imorgado/Desktop/FACEIQHAR/dashboard-*/_next/static/chunks/*.css` - JavaScript: `/Users/imorgado/Desktop/FACEIQHAR/dashboard-*/_next/static/chunks/*.js` - Static assets: `/Users/imorgado/Desktop/FACEIQHAR/dashboard-*/*.png, .svg, .ico`

content.thinking: I've completed the major rebuild of the looksmaxx-app to match FaceIQ's design. Let me provide a summary of what was done.

content.text:
I've successfully rebuilt the looksmaxx-app to match FaceIQ's design. Here's a summary of the changes:

## Completed Tasks

### Theme & Styling
- **globals.css**: Converted from dark theme (black/cyan neon) to FaceIQ's light theme (white/gray)
- **layout.tsx**: Changed font from Geist to Manrope (FaceIQ's font)
- **tailwind.config.ts**: Updated with light theme color tokens

### Pages Rebuilt with FaceIQ Styling
1. **Home page** (`page.tsx`): Clean white landing page with gray-900 CTA buttons, pricing section
2. **Login page**: Google OAuth button matching FaceIQ exactly, referral code input
3. **Gender selection**: Card-based selection with checkmark indicators
4. **Ethnicity selection**: Multi-select list with checkbox styling
5. **Upload page**: Two-step upload flow with progress indicators
6. **Analysis page**: Step-by-step progress with front/side/results flow

### Components Updated
- **FrontProfileLandmarks**: Light theme with gray buttons, white cards
- **SideProfileManualTool**: Light theme styling, clean borders
- **ResultsDashboard**: White cards, green/amber status colors

### Key Design Changes
- White backgrounds instead of black
- Gray-900 for primary buttons/text instead of cyan neon
- Gray-100/200 for secondary backgrounds and borders
- Green-500/600 for success states
- Manrope font family
- Subtle shadows and borders instead of glowing effects

All lint and type checks pass. The app now matches FaceIQ's clean, professional, minimalist design language with the light theme, proper typography, and the same component patterns (rounded buttons, subtle borders, consistent spacing).

message.content:
This session is being continued from a previous conversation that ran out of context. The conversation is summarized below:
Analysis:
Let me analyze the conversation chronologically to capture all important details:

1. **Initial Request**: User wants to rebuild `/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app` to look exactly like FaceIQ by copying HTML/CSS from specific directories on their Desktop, using MediaPipe + face-api.js for auto-detection and scoring from a calculation engine prompt.

2. **Source Materials**:
   - FaceIQ dashboard HTML/CSS from `~/Desktop/FACEIQHAR/dashboard-front/`, `dashboard-side/`, `dashboard-overview/`
   - Scoring logic from `~/Desktop/reverse-engineer/BUILD_CALCULATION_ENGINE_PROMPT.md`

3. **Initial Exploration**: I launched a background task to explore FaceIQ source files and found:
   - The files are at `~/Desktop/FACEIQHAR/` (not in reverse-engineer folder)
   - FaceIQ uses: Next.js 14, Tailwind CSS, Manrope font
   - Light theme with gray-900 buttons, white backgrounds
   - Clean minimalist design

4. **Theme Conversion - Light Theme**: I updated multiple files to match FaceIQ's design:
   - globals.css - light theme CSS variables
   - layout.tsx - Manrope font
   - tailwind.config.ts - light theme colors
   - All pages (login, gender, ethnicity, upload, analysis, home)
   - Components (FrontProfileLandmarks, SideProfileManualTool, ResultsDashboard)

5. **Lint Errors Fixed**:
   - Removed unused `Image` import from login/page.tsx
   - Fixed parsing error in upload/page.tsx (comment syntax issue)

6. **USER FEEDBACK - CRITICAL**: User said "Make it have our dark mode theme like we did have before but keep everything else the same. The only different is that the white should be black and the font should be white, and the accent should be that blue that we had" and later "keep the cyan and neon and black. We just needed the exact structure and look of the website."

7. **Theme Reversion - Dark Theme**: Started reverting to dark theme with cyan (#00f3ff) accents:
   - Updated globals.css with dark theme (black background, white text, cyan accent)
   - Updated page.tsx (home page) with dark theme
   - Updated login/page.tsx with dark theme
   - Still need to update: gender, ethnicity, upload, analysis pages and components

Key files that need dark theme updates:
- `/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/app/gender/page.tsx`
- `/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/app/ethnicity/page.tsx`
- `/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/app/upload/page.tsx`
- `/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/app/analysis/page.tsx`
- `/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/components/FrontProfileLandmarks.tsx`
- `/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/components/SideProfileManualTool.tsx`
- `/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/components/ResultsDashboard.tsx`

Summary:
1. Primary Request and Intent:
